class_notes: "Special Topic: Transnational Icons. Exploration of how, why, and the extent to which cultural icons (e.g. Frida Kahlo, Wonder Woman) function rhetorically across borders. Full course description at tinyurl.com/icons380."
course_description: Select topics or practice in rhetoric, writing, and literacy. Possible topics include writing for specific purposes, rhetorical theory, and digital literacies. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
